ai-tha-ap107:1.1_0: “They’re not seen by the one who thinks,
ai-tha-ap107:1.2_0: I’m not very arrival at them.
ai-tha-ap107:2.4_0: I have gone to the divine eye.
ai-tha-ap107:3.1_0: On the contrary, the water flower nearby,
ai-tha-ap107:3.4_0: Would I have a bad destination?
ai-tha-ap107:4.1_0: And the sixteen kings presented him.
ai-tha-ap107:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mucalinda.
